summary: Personable CAD Designer/Drafter who communicates openly and effectively with all involved, from construction site workers to company CEOs. Successfully sees projects through from initial planning stages to completion.Highly skilled with broad expertise. Successful at anticipating future issues and implementing creative solutions. Highlights Land development planning Erosion and sedimentation control Technical plan execution Civil 3D AutoCAD specialist Water piping design Complex problem solver Advanced critical thinking Strong decision maker Map creation software Topographic studies Surveying Local municipality projects Land use approval process Construction surveying Permit applications Inland Empire regional knowledge Highly accurate Independent worker
